description: Unique internal identifier for a user profile status record.
Business code or name representing the user profile status used in application logic.
Human-readable description or label for the status shown in the UI and documentation.
Boolean flag indicating this status is the default assigned to new user profiles.
Boolean flag indicating this status should be hidden from lookup lists and dropdowns.
Boolean flag to exclude this status from reports and analytics visualizations.
Free-text notes providing context, usage guidance, or exceptions for the status.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this status record.
Soft-delete flag indicating the status is inactive and should not be used.
Timestamp of the last change performed by a user on this record; likely overlaps with audit fields; confirm with SME.
User identifier of the account that created this record.
Timestamp when this record was initially created.
User identifier of the account that last modified this record.
Timestamp when this record was last modified by a user.
